query:
SELECT 
  tc.id as inspection_id,
  tc.task_id,
  tc.template_id,
  tc.status,
  tc.stage,
  COUNT(cir.id) as item_count
FROM task_checklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklist_item_results cir ON cir.task_checklist_id = tc.id
WHERE tc.id = 30001
GROUP BY tc.id, tc.task_id, tc.template_id, tc.status, tc.stage;
